Class Grep

  • java.lang.Object
    • Grep

  • public class Grep
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Grep encapsulates static methods for line-by-line filtering of the input stream of text information by a given word or some words case-sensitive or case-insensitive or by regular expression.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Grep()

      static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> onlyLinesContainingAWord(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> source, boolean caseSensitive, java.lang.String word) 
      static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> onlyLinesContainingSomeWords(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> source, boolean caseSensitive, java.lang.String... words) 
      static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> onlyLinesMatchingRegex(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> source, java.lang.String pattern)

      • onlyLinesContainingAWord

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> onlyLinesContainingAWord(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> source,
                                                                                 boolean caseSensitive,
                                                                                 java.lang.String word)
        Parameters:
        caseSensitive - True means filtering will be case sensitive.
        Returns:
        A stream of lines from source text-stream that contain given word.

      • onlyLinesContainingAllWords

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> onlyLinesContainingAllWords(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> source,
                                                                                    boolean caseSensitive,
                                                                                    java.lang.String... words)
        Parameters:
        caseSensitive - True means filtering will be case sensitive.
        Returns:
        A stream of lines from source text-stream that contain all of given words.

      • onlyLinesContainingSomeWords

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> onlyLinesContainingSomeWords(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> source,
                                                                                     boolean caseSensitive,
                                                                                     java.lang.String... words)
        Parameters:
        caseSensitive - True means filtering will be case sensitive.
        Returns:
        A stream of lines from source text-stream that contain at least one of given words.

      • onlyLinesMatchingRegex

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> onlyLinesMatchingRegex(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> source,
                                                                               java.lang.String pattern)
        Returns:
        A stream of lines from source text-stream in which there was founded a match with the given pattern.
